title: I Was Killed by My Classmates and Became God’s Gofer - Novel Updates
tags: Bullying   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Discrimination   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Gods   Kingdoms   Male to Female   Multiple Transported Individuals   Revenge   Special Abilities   Summoning Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Himezaki Shiu   姫崎しう
description:
For the sake of our class, I who got the “contract” skill during the class transfer, secretly made a contract with the country that summoned us. However, that action resulted in the start of my bullying. In addition to the bullying that gets worse with each passing day, there were also all kinds of dirty tricks employed by the Summoning Kingdom, Fraus. At last, my body can’t endure anymore, and I ended up getting killed by my own classmates.

I was supposed to be dead by then, but I was sent back to the god of this world.

“Eh you will let me live again?”

“but I have to listen to your request?”

“isn’t that just being a gofer?”

“And… what do you mean by only having a female body for me to revive in.”

But oh well, it doesn’t really matter anyways, lets just go and be a gofer.

“However, it’s not like I really want to revive, so please listen to my request as well, okay?”

Then, the me that descent to that world for the second time, along with my classmates, will continue to run god’s errand.>
